title: Snap vs Twitter: Which Social Media Stock Are Analysts Betting On?

Snap vs Twitter: Which Social Media Stock Are Analysts Betting On?

Investing.com3rdPartyStock Markets Sep 04, 2019 13:16 By

za.investing.com/analysis/opening-bell-caution-prevails-ahead-of-fed-decision-oil-spike-eases-200431062 Snap vs Twitter: Which Social Media Stock Are Analysts Betting On? By Investing.com3rdParty | Sep 04, 2019 13:16 By Investing.com3rdParty | Sep 04, 2019 13:16

Social media has transformed the way people communicate and interact with each other. With the Global X Social Media ETF gaining 19% year-to-date, it’s no question that this space has taken off. This fact has not been ignored by investors who are constantly looking for compelling opportunities within this sector.
